query: Standard Deluxe Dirt Road Century gravel race Waverly

videos.title: 2018 Standard Deluxe Dirt Road Century - Waverly, Alabama
videos.description:
Are you ready for 60 or 100 miles of chunky, flowing, red, dirt roads? Waverly, Alabama is home to some of the most highly concentrated dirt roads in Alabama. Starting at the folksy Standard Deluxe music venue, (http://standarddeluxe.com) riders take on a 60-mile or 100-mile loop during a self-supported dirt road race. This is the perspective of K-Dogg of the Gravel Cyclist crew, filmed on October 20, 2018.

Enjoy!

K-Dogg's race report - .https://wp.me/p4V4se-702

Terra Firma Cycling - http://www.terrafirmacycling.com

Amazon Affiliation Link:
No cost to you, but every purchase made helps keep Gravel Cyclist up and running! - https://www.amazon.com/?&_encoding=UTF8&tag=gravelcyclist-20&linkCode=ur2&linkId=6b862b6af640d29360e2af2a5f17ddc6&camp=1789&creative=9325

Web: http://GravelCyclist.com
Facebook: http://facebook.com/GravelCyclist
Instagram - http://Instagram/GravelCyclist
Twitter - http://twitter.com/GravelCyclist
Vimeo - http://vimeo.com/GravelCyclist
videos.transcript:
[Music]
good day TR Setters and welcome to the
2018 standard Deluxe dirt road Century
the 60m version held on October 20 in
Waverly
Alabama in the morning there is peace
and Tranquility but that would soon
change as Riders begin to roll in for
the start of this
race the organizing crew of terrafirma
cycling also have a 100m version of this
race but your cameraman in this video is
none other than K Dog of reavel cyclist
who's at least 63 years of age he's just
a we spritely
lad a nice and relaxed neutral roll out
is in effect before the fun of the day
begins ahead of K dog is ktie Bolton
owner and manager of procycle and
Triathlon in downtown Fair Hope Alabama
she also sells these sweet water bottles
that I personally Ed all of the time so
check out her website if you like some
of your
own moving on K Dog isn't the fastest
descender in the world and he plays it
safe during the early miles his
specialty is going up hills particularly
long climbs which don't exactly feature
in Alabama rather they're short and
Punchy regardless he's hiding out and
likely milking the age card whilst
trying not to get
dropped as you can see from some of the
bicycles in this video anything goes in
gravel cycling and racing there's no
rules or any organizational overlords so
let's hope it stays that
way this part of Alabama is hardly flat
and The Punchy Hills are wreaking havoc
in the group K Dog watches momentarily
as a small group of riders sneaks away
but he's likely not to let that happen
so he busts his ass to bridge up to the
leaders solo which definitely
hurt now it's a matter of working with
the leading Lads when he can in and
dropped in this scene The Lads are
taking a bit easier and getting
themselves on
camera the Tom fery didn't last long and
not long after the rain started to fall
this means everyone's bike and ass got
covered in crap you could use a fender
but nah not at this race
the leaders are launching attacks
against each other whilst K Dog hangs
around the back mostly as collateral
damage as you can see from the change in
the number of riders ahead of K Dog
these Lads aren't exactly taking it easy
into the Last Mile and K dog rolls in
Solo to take fifth place overall in the
60 mile
race kogg sends along his Kudos to the
other Lads namely Todd Pete Scott and
Lena
thank you for watching if you haven't
already please subscribe to the gravel
cyclist YouTube channel and don't forget
to press the Bell button for updates
I'll see you in the next video

videos.title: 2016 Standard Deluxe Dirt Road Century - Waverly, Alabama
videos.description:
November 6th, 2016, the Gravel Cyclist crew of JOM, K-Dogg Dr. Pain and guest rider, the Belgian Diesel, departed their USA hometown of Gainesville, Florida to attend the inaugural edition of the Standard Deluxe Dirt Road Century.

JOM's race report - http://wp.me/p4V4se-3xM
K-Dogg's race report - .http://wp.me/p4V4se-3yP

Enjoy!

Web: http://GravelCyclist.com
Facebook: http://facebook.com/GravelCyclist
Instagram - http://Instagram/GravelCyclist
Twitter - http://twitter.com/GravelCyclist
Vimeo - http://vimeo.com/GravelCyclist
